attributes.name: data-tchmi-x-label-font-family
attributes.description: X Axis Label: Comma separated list of family name or keyword: 'serif', 'sans-serif', 'monospace'.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-x-label-font-weight
attributes.description: X Axis Label Font Weight 'Normal', 'Bold' (glyphs with more weight) or 'Auto' for inherited.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-x-axis-name-font-family
attributes.description: Comma separated list of family name or keyword: 'serif', 'sans-serif', 'monospace'.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-x-axis-name-font-weight
attributes.description: 'Normal', 'Bold' (glyphs with more weight) or 'Auto' for inherited.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-x-axis-format
attributes.description: A formatting function to format the xAxis values (HTML not allowed).

attributes.name: data-tchmi-y-label-font-family
attributes.description: For the Y Axis. Comma separated list of family name or keyword: 'serif', 'sans-serif', 'monospace'.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-y-label-font-weight
attributes.description: For the Y Axis. 'Normal', 'Bold' (glyphs with more weight) or 'Auto' for inherited.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-tooltip-format
attributes.description: A formatting function to format the tooltip text (HTML allowed).

attributes.name: data-tchmi-tooltip-font-family
attributes.description: Comma separated list of family name or keyword: 'serif', 'sans-serif', 'monospace'.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-tooltip-font-weight
attributes.description: 'Normal', 'Bold' (glyphs with more weight) or 'Auto' for inherited.
